      • findWidget

        public IMapWidget findWidget​(java.lang.String name,
                             boolean deep)
        Find a widget by name within either: - this parent's immediate children list - this entire parent widget's hierarchy
        Parameters:
        name - Widget unique name
        deep - True to perform a deep find, false to perform a shallow find
        Returns:
        Widget that matches or null if not found

      • setZOrder

        public void setZOrder​(double zOrder)
        Description copied from class: MapWidget
        Set the ascending order of the MapItem. zOrder affects hit order. Note: zOrder does not affect rendering order at this time.
        Specified by:
        setZOrder in interface IMapWidget
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
